name: ALEX County Query Integration
description: HTTP Request node configuration for querying ALEX Knowledge Base with automatic county-based notebook routing

documentation.purpose: Query ALEX for county-specific information (URLs, filing processes) before scraping. Automatically routes to the correct regional notebook.
documentation.usage: Add this node before the scraping step in ALEX County Rotation Scraper workflow

nodes.name: Query ALEX for County URL
nodes.notes: Queries ALEX with county-based routing. The API automatically routes to the correct regional notebook and adds county context to the question.

nodes.name: Extract URL from ALEX Response
nodes.notes: Parses ALEX response including routing info. Sets use_fallback flag if no URL found.

nodes.name: IF URL Found
nodes.notes: Routes to ALEX URL if found, otherwise falls back to Google Sheet lookup

integration_instructions.step_1: Open the 'ALEX - County Rotation Scraper' workflow in N8N
integration_instructions.step_2: Add the 'Query ALEX for County URL' HTTP Request node BEFORE the county scraping step
integration_instructions.step_3: Connect the county list/iteration node to 'Query ALEX for County URL'
integration_instructions.step_4: Add the 'Extract URL from ALEX Response' Code node after the HTTP request
integration_instructions.step_5: Add the 'IF URL Found' node to branch based on whether ALEX returned a URL
integration_instructions.step_6: Connect TRUE branch to use ALEX URL for scraping
integration_instructions.step_7: Connect FALSE branch to your existing Google Sheet fallback logic

routing_info.description: The API automatically routes counties to the correct regional notebook
